title: Vision Training & Eye Exercise
description:
Optics Trainer is a free Vision Training and Eye Exercise app designed to exercise your visual skills. 

In collaboration with Optometrists and Eyecare Professionals, we've created a variety of games and exercises designed for Sports Vision, Vision Training, Eye Exercise, and Vision Therapy. 

For advanced games designed for amblyopia, strabismus, double vision, and convergence insufficiency; see our VR products at www.opticstrainer.com

FEATURES:
16 Activities designed to work on a variety of visual skills (with more to come!)
Eye-Hand Coordination 
Eye Movement 
Peripheral Vision 
Momentary Vision 
Dynamic Acuity 
Selective Attention
Multiple Object Tracking
Eye Tracking
Saccades
Pursuits
Visual Discrimination
Visualization

PLAYER LEADERBOARDS
Compete with other players around the world

More About Us: www.opticstrainer.com
Contact Us: contact@opticstrainer.com
Terms of Service: https://www.opticstrainer.com/terms-of-service/
Privacy Policy: https://www.opticstrainer.com/privacy-policy/
